      public Account​(double initialBalance, User owner) throws java.lang.Exception
      Default constructor
      Parameters:
      initialBalance - the balance the account will start with
      owner - the owner of the account, of type User (either a manager or customer)
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - the exception comes from the User initialization

    • Account

      public Account​(int id, double bal, User owner) throws java.lang.Exception
      Manual Constructor
      Parameters:
      id - the id that the account should have
      bal - the balance that the account with begin with
      owner - the owner of the account, of type User
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - the exception comes from the User initialization

      public void deposit​(double amount) throws java.lang.Exception
      Use to deposit money into the account
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of money to be deposited into THIS account
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - thrown if the amount entered is, negative or greater than the upper limit, 10k

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw​(double amount) throws java.lang.Exception
      Use to withdraw money from the account
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of money to be withdrawn from THIS account
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - thrown if the amount entered is, negative, greater than the upper limit, or reduces THIS account balance to zero, or less.

    • purchase

      public void purchase​(double amount) throws java.lang.Exception

      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of money to be withdrawn from THIS account
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - thrown if the amount entered is, negative, greater than the upper limit, or reduces THIS account balance to zero, or less.
